descriptions: Fixed an issue where player gender would display as 'Unknown' for QBCore and QBox frameworks due to a data type mismatch (string vs number).
Fixed a typo in the database parsing logic for QBCore/QBox where female characters were incorrectly assigned the male translation.
Fixed a critical NUI crash caused by clearing number inputs in the Custom Charge modal which resulted in a NaN parsing error.
Fixed an issue where society funds from fines were not deposited correctly if the officer's job name was customized to something other than the default police.
Fixed an issue where the tablet prop animation would occasionally fail to clear after closing the MDT UI.
Improved security when saving custom mugshot images to prevent potential directory traversal exploits.
